name: send_upload_link
description: Generate a secure upload token and send an email with the upload portal link to a client. The client can use this link to upload their tax documents without needing to log in. The link is time-limited and unique to each client.

client_id.description: The unique identifier of the client who should receive the upload link

days_valid.description: Number of days the upload link should remain valid. Must be between 1 and 90. Default is 30 days.

custom_message.description: Optional custom message from the accountant to include in the email. This will be added before the standard instructions.
